short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can use Multi-language Virtual Keyboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You are having trouble with the native language on the keyboard on your laptop. Or are you even learning a new language, need to change the keyboard interface to suit that language? Our application will help you add multiple multilingual keyboard interfaces easily. You don't have to spend a lot of money to buy a new keyboard, our application is completely free.
